articles.title: Tesco closing all food counters and hot delis in its Essex supermarkets - Essex Live
articles.description: Customers no longer see the counters and delis as a 'significant reason' to come into store
articles.content: Supermarket giant Tesco has announced it will be closing all of its remaining food counters and hot delis at the end of the month, impacting several Essex stores. The "difficult" announcement came on… [+2250 chars]
